### Project Setup

1.  Create a new project in RStudio called **Introduction to R**.
2.  Install the following packages:

```{r,eval=FALSE}
install.packages("read_excel")
```

### Data

You will need to download data throughout this session using the `download.file()` function in R.

If you are using a **Windows** computer you will need to explicitly add the argument `mode = "wb"`.

```{r, eval=FALSE}

## Create a directory to store the data
dir.create("data")

## Mac or Linux
download.file("http://bifx-core3.bio.ed.ac.uk/training/DSB/data/qPCR_data2.xlsx", destfile = "data/qpcr_data2.xlsx")

## Windows
download.file("http://bifx-core3.bio.ed.ac.uk/training/DSB/data/qPCR_data2.xlsx", destfile = "data/qpcr_data2.xlsx", mode = "wb")
```
